name: Toy Wars
description:
How about stepping in the shoes of the robots you used to love as a kid? You can do just that, right now! Your mission? To defend the toy chest, at all costs! Boot up Toy Wars, and let the party begin!

In Toy Wars, you have to defend your toy chest, from within! You see, evil toys are trying to take over, and shan’t happen on your watch! So get in your toy-sized giant mech, strap on your seatbelt, and show those baddies what you’re made of!

This game was entirely made in 48 hours during the Movie Jam event at the 3IS International Institute...

… by these people:

Yann ROIRAND - PRODUCER

Vanessa VAUTRIN - GRAPHIC ARTIST

Axel SUZANNE - GRAPHIC ARTIST

Marie WILST - GRAPHIC ARTIST

François GUILLAUME - GRAPHIC ARTIST - MOCAP TECHNICIAN

Guillaume d’ARCY-ORGA - SOUND DESIGNER

Sébastien BIGARE - LEAD GAME DESIGNER

Chakib BENSSOUM - GAME DESIGNER

Nuuruudiin ASSOCK - DEVELOPER

Fabrizio SANTORO - LEAD DEVELOPER

Horace RIBOUT - LEAD DEVELOPER

SPECIAL THANKS

to all the other people without whom this game would simply not exist:

Adrien Neto - For tirelessly sponsoring Yann.

Alexis Moroz - For providing the air mattresses and for making this entire event happen.

Julien, Fabrizio, Benjamin & Ayrton - For generously providing the air in aforementioned mattresses.

Philippe Blanchet - For welcoming us all in his school over the week-end, for providing sunday morning’s viennoiseries, for everything else he did for us, and for this unforgettable week-end!

Valerie de Palma - For her advice, her work and her professionalism while helping us use the Mocap over the week-end - thanks a lot, you’ve been a blessing!

Théo Follain & Marie Dragée - For having been top-notch Mocap actors for us on short notice - you gave us flawless performances and it’s been such a pleasure working with you two!

Paul le Borne Cueff - For helping us make the most out of the sound recording equipment made available to us - thanks a lot mate!

Matthieu Ferrandez - For being available 24/7 and for helping us whenever he can however he can instead of sleeping - we hope, seeing our games, you’ll feel your sacrifice wasn’t made in vain.

Do follow us on FaceBook ---> https://www.facebook.com/groups/263303647494130/

Peace out!
